Review.Titre: Company will not stop even when asked
Review.Contenu: I have asked the company to stop soliciting in spam bot messaging in Destiny 2. This company can't respect a basic no thank you that has been made 5 times over. Every time it's oh give us you gamer tag and we will stop. Lol what a joke. After the clear ineptitude I wouldn't trust them with a pet rock let alone my game account.

Review.Titre: Too many customers with not enough…
Review.Contenu: Too many customers with not enough service providers.  With everyone on your side saved, loot was scarce, and there were an unacceptable number or wipes.  I've used your service quite a few times now, but this will be my last.

Review.Titre: I've spent thousands on this site and…
Review.Contenu: I've spent thousands on this site and sometime in the last week they seem to have changed to armor stacking to lower your chance they claim its random but its happened multiple times on multiple toons and classes that you have 7+ of the same armor type to roll against and not even counting tier tokens I have screen shots and videos as proof its shady AF and they have lost a longtime customer as a resultEdit after reply It had nothing to do with wanting to be the only one in the raid with an armor type but having literally 7/10 be the same every single time I went in raids on multiple classes which means its been stacked coz it can be random once or twice but not over and over

After all but the last boss the raid lead said that another group would finish the run and i would be contacted with more information.After 20 minutes of waiting i asked them what the problem was and how long it would be. Roughly 5 mins after that I was informed they had technical difficulties with no reason. I was informed the wait time would be another 10 minutes then i spent the next hour and a half waiting.

Review.Titre: Consistently delayed start times and Poor Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Fourth (and last) raid I ran with them in a row, where the start time was delayed and nobody responded on the discord support service.  Finally got a hold of someone on the website and after 15 minutes I was told my raid was going to start.  Waited another 15 minutes and nothing. I will trying one of their competitors on my next run.  They may not be better, but they are significantly cheaper and they cant be worse.  The headaches you will experience with this service are worse than a PUG, so save your money.

Review.Titre: Run delayed by over an hour and a half…
Review.Contenu: Run delayed by over an hour and a half in the middle of the night with no contact. After contacting customer support at the 30-minute mark, I was told it's a "tech issue". When contacting them again an hour later, I was asked to reschedule for yet ANOTHER four hours later. All of this without them contacting me at any point to explain these "delays".   Felt pretty sketchy coming to a site like this and I was absolutely correct, but at least I don't have to worry about getting banned from what else they bumble up. When asking for a refund they were evasive, and when doubling down I was just told "sure :(". This site is obviously a scam and I doubt I'm ever going to see this money refunded, but steer clear.

They didn't fulfill enough unsaved raiders which provided less loot on the main boss I needed, on the last boss of the raid they kicked me from the group before looting completed and I lost out on loot. I attempted to ticket with blizzard but they don't do loot reassignments.

My gold purchase from you, WowVendor, got my account banned for two weeks. Game support is taking back all gold or items purchased with that gold. Basically, your mistake getting caught and I have no game gold and lost real cash and suspended for two weeks. Wish I never tried to buy gold from you and would never recommend you to anyone.

Review.Titre: 3rd raid in a row that has started over…
Review.Contenu: 3rd raid in a row that has started over an hour late.  Great service, if you are not time gated, but if you have limited windows to play in and need to have a semi accurate timeframe followed, this is NOT the service for you.  Look elsewhere.

I bought a Normal 9/9 run.They did 8/9. I followed up numerous times through 5 days. They were non-responsive. They kept telling me to sign up for the final boss. There were no openings. Also, the website wanted me to pay for the final boss again.I'm in dispute with them on PayPal.This company is the worse of all the running companies and twice the price as companies like KingBoost.

Review.Titre: Got a raid boost and when they got to…
Review.Contenu: Got a raid boost and when they got to the last boss they started asking some of the customers to port out of the raid and do it later…… clowns

I have used your services dozens of time throughout the years, specifically in WoW.  Just got back into the game for the latest patch, and bought 2 normal raid runs for different toons.  First one was great as always- second one I wasn’t invited to group, so I was contacted on discord to join a later run… and then was not invited again.  I reached out on discord, and an associate did some research and said another character with a similar name was invited and completed the run and was able to see that it was in fact a mistake… which is fine, mistakes happen.  Here is the major issue… After relaying this info and recognizing the problem, the staff member said that since the run was completed for a different toon (not mine, no affiliation) that it was marked complete and I would just lose my money that I paid for the run?? Is this a reputable business or the mafia?? That explanation is comical, and I will just use one of the dozens of other services in the future.
My run was scheduled for 7:30, and I waited til 10:30. no communication from them at all.

I bought a full clear of the Amirdrassil raid.They were unable to kill the final boss on normal first week. I followed up every day. They never put me in another raid to finish. I wasted a lot of time reaching out to them to largely be ignored.

I purchased a heroic raid run and selected my time slot.  Once purchased they informed me that the entire run wouldn't be performed at the selected time but would be split between two different time frames.  I contacted customer service and were not helpful at all.  Seemed more interested in insisting they were not false advertising.  Asked for a refund and was blown off so I had to file a claim with paypal.

Review.Titre: account got banned using their service
Review.Contenu: account got banned using their service, they then offered a heroic edition of dragonflight, a free lvling of a character 60-70 and also a normal raid carry so i could play on another account while my main was banned. I asked a week after they offered me this if the codes were available yet and support acted like they had no idea what i was talking about and blew me off. They shouldnt have offered if they were going to not follow through in the end

didn't complete all the runs, swapped out members to only do the same 3 out of 8 dungeons for a 8x mythic +10 run. Seems like they didn't want to get me over 1k mythic plus rating as it would conflict with another service they were selling. Waste of 200 dollars.

Review.Contenu: I ordered 3x checkpoints for a master RON weekly challenge and instead the recov just used my spoils to buy the other two weapons taking the short cut. Terrible service so I now will need to spend time getting those spoils back.

These guys are nothing but obnoxious. They'll use any means necessary to reach out to people and spam them. I'm not interested in your god damn obnoxious service. If I was I'd look at the service channel. Don't freaking try to reach out to me you scummy people

Maybe try to claify you are putting Legend raids first and bot mentioning legend. Who would pay for a normal clear when Master is available. It is just stupid and this is a scam. Use other services that clearly state what they are selling.

Review.Contenu: The guy who actually did the run was just a random free service guy who had no idea I paid anyone, this company is just a middleman that get money for no reason. For poe anyway...

Also the boosters went so fast through the dungeons and I could not keep up with them. The boosters are non communicative during the run. Very unhappy with the service

Review.Titre: The service is a complete joke
Review.Contenu: The service is a complete joke. You can purchase the regular service but do not expect to get anything out of it other than AOTC. If you may think at all that loot will drop you would be wrong. They basically have all the raiders locked out so there is no chance of getting loot from the boss' The only reason I chose to do this was for the chance at some loot. I get that i wont get a bunch of it but i had hoped for maybe one piece or something. Good luck getting any gear at all. The experience is a joke and I will make sure that I never use any of their services again and push for a refund.

Very poor communication from company.  You are told to wait 20 minutes, 45 minutes later you are told hold on, after another 15 minutes you are told we are inviting in 5-10 minutes, after 25-30 minutes later you ask again and finally get into your party.  All you get from this time wasted is a "o, we are sorry.  we screwed up" I am aware you did.  They punish you if you have issues and are not on their timelines no matter what the reason.  Been with them for a long time but change is needed after this.  I would recommended going with a different company.

Ordered master solo lost sector, the eta was 1- 24 hours. Booster ignored my order for 4 days. The booster Never responded to customer service, so I was left on read for hours on end. Customer service deemed 24 hours to complete a master flawless solo lost sector was unrealistic time frame.

Review.Titre: Usually my runs go great and there is…
Review.Contenu: Usually my runs go great and there is no issue.I bought a weekly run, a hour before the raid was supposed to start and it included a +17 mythic.mythic added me and told me they would start soon- half hour went by. Okay, still got a half hour, i get into the dungeon and we are going through it. Well, the raid messages me and asks what is going on, that they can't wait for me any longer.I of course not thinking said that I bought their bundle deal and it wasn't my fault they did the dungeon first. Customer service ofc contacted me and said that since I mentioned boosting I have to wait 24 hours for the safety of my account. Since I didn't want to wait and was already peeved about being put in a situation I told them to just charge me the mythic and refund the rest.They gave me a store credit-- which honestly I probably won't use. I just felt stupid and pressured when I'm not the one setting up the times.

These spamming scammers just want your money when there are thousands of people willing to help for free. Shame on these kids.Edit: thanks for the senseless comment Mary. Your input brought true value to the experience.

Review.Titre: Same as a PUG.  But....  A PUG is free!  Save your $$ or use a different service.
Review.Contenu: Figured I would give this service one more try, after last nights fiasco.  I would have loved to have left a positive review today, but that isnt going to be possible.  After 2 hours, 5 wipes on the 2nd to last boss, we are still going.  I am very doubtful they will even be able to get us past Sarkareth.  I ranted and raved about this service in VOTI, but something has changed, because my runs in season 2 have been dumpster fires. Find another service or just save your $$ and run a PUG.  You will have the same result.

Not worth, they check what your class is and on purpose don’t bring any of your class and so you don’t get any loot. Change classes before purchase and you can see how the time of the raid changes. Don’t waste your money unless you’re after the achievement only. They brought like 4 hunters and the only loot were mail and guns that none of us could use…

When u configure the boost it gives no clear explanation. Took longer than advertised to complete the order. The master NF order is only one run with no more options and it gives no reward. Just a total waste of money.

So I booked the package for Heroic Clear and a +16 dungeon on Monday morning. I asked if they could do the dungeon run today because the package allows 1-3 days to complete. The raid run was quick and smooth but I never heard anything more about the dungeon run. Three days later I'm trying to reach out and all they wanted to talk about was why I couldn't reach customer service via Discord. I gave up the run and this will be my last purchase with wowvendor.com.
Raid started 2 hours late. Got told there would be a short 10 minute break that ended up taking over an hour.

Review.Titre: Ordered a level boost. Never got done
Review.Contenu: Ordered a level boost. Gave them the account at level 28 so all they had to do was go to 55. Two weeks later never got finished. Even paid extra for the express option and website said to take 24-36 hours. So don’t expect it to be done when you want it to or what the website tells you it will be done. Cuz it never will be. Communication was terrible kept telling me it would be done daily then I would check progress daily and it never got touched.

Review.Titre: I ordered this company’s services to…
Review.Contenu: I ordered this company’s services to assist me in completing Legendary missions in Destiny 2. They said they would be available for 5pm (CST) in the US. I gave them a 44 minute heads up. They responded saying they had 45 minutes. At 5pm and 5:15pm I got no response. I wrote them that if they were not online by 5:30pm I would file a complaint and reach out to PayPal for a refund.

I've used these guys before, always 5 stars. Better than Overgear, especially when it comes to customer service. First booster messed up the logins, like 3 or 4 times, lol. Dude couldn't figure out the codes, repeated typo errors- probably high AF. Second booster did fine with the login. Before I ordered the boost, I let them know that it was -very important- that all my bars, keybinds and options settings needed to be put back to where the booster found them. After the boost was done, all of my bars and keybinds and options were screwed up. I contacted WowVendor, and the booster told them they had "Technical Difficulties," so they couldn't change anything back (doubtful, yeah?) So the booster marked the order as completed and moved on without fixing anything. Unprofessional service from the booster on this order. After I complained about the settings problems, the booster said they were busy, and that it would take a few hours before they could correct their mistakes. Try again later. Will have to go through the login codes nonsense all over again. Bummer! Order #1182202edit: The customer service was again, excellent and they addressed my concerns afterwards, but I will add that the booster not only messed up my talents, he somehow OVERWROTE my other 2 talent builds. Had to rebuild my trees. Oof!

Paid $70 for a platinum gm nightfall and didn’t get the platinum finish. Pro asked if I really needed it. I mean , I paid $70 what do you think. At least we finished the GM but still very disappointed and feeling robbed.

I've done a bunch of runs with these guys but no more. Don't waste your money. Also, this is the second time I've left this review because somehow my first review "disappeared."

Review.Titre: Every drop seemed to go to two people…
Review.Contenu: Every drop seemed to go to two people in the raid and when their weee rolls they always won even on greed. Not the experience I was expecting nor will I return for any more runs with that group. Seems like those two were being fed gear on our dime.

This was not the case and the items were kept for themselves.I was offered a discount for my "inconvenience" but have yet to receive it.

Review.Contenu: The run didn’t go as planned took over 4 hours. They switched groups three times. We took 25 minutes in breaks. I was told an 1:30 to 2:00 hours for abberus. The raid was 35 minutes late. To top it all off the stock email for the review said “hey superstar”. Yeah it was pretty much all bad. Little to no explanation as to why we were constantly wiping. I should’ve pugged.

Review.Titre: You killed the boss easily and i could…
Review.Contenu: You killed the boss easily and i could do the fight which was great, i wasn’t expecting personal loot so could be my bad. But yea nah that wasnt worth it. Chances if loot was so insanely low it felt like a scam.

Review.Titre: If I could rate this 0 stars, I would. Be diligent with what service you buy from this site, the one I purchased was as close to a SCAM as you can get!
Review.Contenu: If I could put 0 stars, I would. I paid $109 for a level 60-70 power-level + an 8/8 mythic 0 dungeon run by a TEAM who would try to gear the character as close to a full set of 379 gear from scratch from those 8 dungeons. What I received instead was a auto-played power-level that took multiple days, and then a SINGULAR booster to run the dungeons on my behalf on my account BY THEMSELVES in PUG groups without even trying to armor stack. All I got from this $109 was a power-level, and a few purple pieces. The funny part is, the Customer Service Bot even admitted that there was a flaw in their description of the service on the website. They did not mention anywhere in the package that the 8/8 M0 run was going to be auto-played and SOLO in PUGS. I have screenshots of them admitting this. They even repeatedly mentioned the boosters as a "team" several times throughout the process, when really it was one single person lollygagging around on my account when I'm not home. You might say I'm a clown for spending $109 on a service like this in the first place, and you're probably right, but this was a big decision for me and I felt it was in the best interest of my time and entertainment value of being able to immediately jump into end game content, but what I got was severely underwhelming and not what was originally described for me. I can't even queue for LFR on this character lol. What a joke.

First it was all going well till the last boss. We were kicked of the group so that they could kill it on their own and then they invited us back to kill it again. Of course since most of the raid had it done already their was no loot on the boss. I tried to complain to the customer service that told me it is normal. But it isn't. They are selling a run with the possibility to loot something on EACH boss. I understand that they may have a lot of demand but if the people leading the raid want to keep the loots for themselves then they shouldn't be paid to take people with. Either you take the money and offer the complete service or you just raid with your guild with noone to carry. I will certainly think twice next time i consider paying for help. And the way the service ghosted me afterward is conforting me in the idea that the quality of the service isn't there anymore. SHOULD PROBABLY TRY ANOTHER SERVICE.
Booster was unreliable with meeting time frame of 47 hours. The booster was constantly offline and made the process Terrible. Customer service was amazing with helping out.
Run went fine. They didn’t add loot type for my armor class and got one piece that wasn’t my class piece out of entire run. Not worth getting advanced package.
They noticed I was tagging along for bosses and made it so only one piece of loot dropped per boss with their comp.

Constantly getting spammed with Calendar Invites about them selling runs on all my characters.I never visited the homepage or showed any kind of interest in the service(s) they provide. So it's beyond frustrating to see it - not just in trade chat - but also get forced into invitations on 10+ characters daily, which you can't just ignore - because a question mark will keep pinning until you do some kind of reaction.This type of advertisement makes it feel desperate, and makes me even less ever want to use "their product/service", if I at any point should change my mind on getting boost services.And please don't waste your time on sending me a customer service response - just stop using it on people who never "signed" up to get your advertisement in this form.Or another way to deal with it - I just start sending you invoices and take payment for the time I spend on administrative work, on removing and now also blocking the "inviters'”. It adds up when it's multiple characters and it's every single day.... So please keep your advertise where people can make a choice to react or not, and not forcing and bothering them =)

In that time I contacted 'customer service' twice to be told they were checking. After not hearing for another hour I gave up waitingTold that customer service arranges time of run despite what it says when buying run. Review.Titre: No response on my question and they move on...

I asked if I could finish something really quick. No response for 6 minutes. The message I get at that point is WowVendor SupportBOT — Today at 6:10 PMUnfortunately, our team has already started the process of another order, we will try to contact you as soon as possible 🙏Then they could not start for another 1-2 hours, when I would no longer be able to be online. Had they just said "no, we cannot wait" or anything, I would dropped what I was doing. But no response and then just moved on? Such poor service. It has been like this of late.

Review.Titre: I should have stayed away.  You should too.
Review.Contenu: I should have stayed away.  I've used them before, and though I've had some horrific experiences, I just returned to the game and figured I'd try them again.  This was the 3rd time I've used them this year, and the first two times were fine.  This last time was completely and utterly unprofessional.We did a run, and through no fault of their own, at the last boss, the system wouldn't let us go any further.  I'll give them that much credit, that there was nothing that they could do.  But the RL, and his crew, had us waiting around for about 45 minutes, and then they all just logged off.  Leaving us all high and dry.  I'm actually more offended at the communication than anything.If you're looking for a professional group, this aint it.  I don't think I expected much, except for them to be professional.  I'm not using them again, I'm sure there's someone else out there who will be professional.

Review.Titre: The prices of the listed options are…
Review.Contenu: The prices of the listed options are too high for the quality of service you recieve. They make sure to go out of their way to not give you any gear or even the chance of having someone in your group that could pass it unless you pay for a loot funnel.

Review.Titre: After good service for years, now poor.
Review.Contenu: I have used them for years, for the most part its been pretty good. 4/5 and 5/5. Now 1/5 -2/5However, as of late like last few months the service has been getting poor.  I have placed several orders that never got finished or never got started and resulted in either a credit or a refund.

Review.Titre: I got a 30 day ban after using this…
Review.Contenu: I got a 30 day ban after using this service, I know i deserved, it to try and get a toon raid ready faster then the right way but just a word of caution Blizzard is onto this service.

Review.Titre: Absolute dumpster fire of a service
Review.Contenu: Absolute dumpster fire of a service. I have a loot log and the two most important bosses i needed some how dropped one piece. I didn't see anyone loot. A guy came in with a lower wep. And hearthed came back all a sudden had a better ilvl. And so many excuses where given. Would never recommend this to anyone

The order was due to start in 2-4 days from the time I made payment. We are now on day 5 with no contact. They keep saying they will have people contact me and no one does. Their customer service keeps making excuses and assuming these other reviews are not fake, it seems like they have no problem completing high-value orders.

Doesn't stand behind their product(s). Will have members upload logs to warcraftlogs.com and thus people in the group get punished for their services. They do not tell people not to upload logs either and the raid lead doesn't attempt to hide the logs or remove them.

After selecting the service I wanted,  I ACCURATELY entered all of my card info for the purchase and their system said there was an "issue". Well, the issue is on your end folks.  It's not my card.  Yes, it's a debit card, yes, there are sufficient funds, yes it's a current card.  My time is too limited to waste time on more than one attempt to buy something.

please do not share account with this company for boosting service. account banned after 2 weeks, they keep switching IP address and Computer.  Said by the customer service: "there is never a 100% of safety. "   let me translate this :" if account got banned, its your own  fault for trusting us . we take 0 responsibility of it, you want a refund? hell no.

Ordered a service and was told it would take 3-5 days to get started. Tried to get updates on my service during that time and nothing was being done to ensure me that it would be started on time. On the 5th day of me waiting for my order I asked if they would be finding someone and I was met with this response “ no, i cant know that”. Very bad customer service and professionalism. Will not use this service ever again.

I have purchased runs on every class and armor type, and every group is stacked with the same, making competition outrageous.If you change your class to one using a different armor type, you'll more often than not see that the times for those runs are different. This is done to ensure the most competition for you, the least likelihood of obtaining anything, and increasing the amount of runs they can complete, or persuade you to purchase a more expensive option. Great business model, but it feels so so bad as a customer.Check my other reviews, you'll see I am an avid customer, this is not a 1 off.
Responsive team, Im sure they would have provided the service i paid for but don't ask for a refund all they gave me was store credit.

Great boosters and CS, but they stack groups to ensure the most competition. Which leads to many rolling for the same token, or a token being passed by all.I have spent thousands and purchased dozens of runs. Trust me when I warn you, purchase a run for achievements and xp, not loot. Feels so bad to pay for a run and leave with nothing because you had to roll against 5-6 others.

Great boosters and CS, but they stack groups to ensure the most competition. Which leads to many rolling for the same token, or a token being passed by all.I have spent thousands and purchased dozens of runs. Trust me when I warn you, purchase a run for achievements and xp, not loot.

Review.Titre: Splitting the raid at the last boss was…
Review.Contenu: Splitting the raid at the last boss was really shady and inviting other dps so you have a bigger chance of losing gear not the best

This was my 3rd boost. My first and third boost were incredible. Easy 5 stars. My 2nd was quite the opposite. Wiping on normal, getting delayed by hours, 2 of the boosters were only ~335 item level. Zero communication unless I reached out first. Of course, I didn't get a link to review that run.

Normally these guys are awesome, but a 15 minute break before they said they are changing groups, then another nearly 15 minutes waiting on the next group. I will of course try them again, but will look for another service if this happens again.

23 people in raid, yet 6 bosses dropped 1 piece of loot. Defeats the purpose of running for a chance at loot if loot doesn't drop. Upgrading for armor funneling is one thing, but there should always be loot dropping. (23 people should guarantee 3 with a 60% chance at 4).

Review.Titre: The loot rules seemed unclear and a bit…
Review.Contenu: The loot rules seemed unclear and a bit rigged to be honest. The price was a bit higher than other sites service that are similar. Run went smooth and started promptly though, i guess thats good? Ill go with a different service next time though.

Review.Titre: Premium standard raid- Downed all but…
Review.Contenu: Premium standard raid- Downed all but last boss (as normal it is split into two separate raids) I let them know via discord that after all bosses except the last had been killed, I had received 0 loot (Literally no leather dropped, lost every roll for trinkets/rings that are used as a tank) I received a response of "damn :(" no mention of being invited to another raid the following week per their "no-luck protection". The 1st group said "another friend will message you with details on the last boss" 2 hours had gone by, I received no messages. I sent a quick chat on discord asking if there was any news on when the last fight would be. 35 mins later, there was still no reply, other than "truly sorry for the waiting time" I'm fine with waiting, I'd just like an actual update so I can plan to be online..

While they do usually give good runs they sometimes fall short on the raids and dont finish them, getting them to finish the run is a huge pain and they give your the run around, I've given up and wont be using them anymore.

Purchased VAULT OF THE INCARNATES NORMAL RAID BOOST and the raid went fine until last boss. the raid was ended. I messaged customer support and was informed that the last boss would be done about 5 hours later.I came back on to complete, no message no raid. I again contact customer support and they tell me it was canceled. Still waiting to finish.

No care or consideration is put into the group creation for the person being boosted. The primary reason most people are there is to get loot and you just haphazardly create groups with 6 people rolling for one tier token while you have other tier tokens that have 0 competition. Definitely not worth the money at all.

Unfortunately, they have a communication issue.One rep said that due to the several missed appointment times, and missing server reset, that they would redo my order the next week.Well, we didn’t finish and that representative is nowhere to be found.  I didn’t feel like pushing the issue as these guys don’t listen.Be sure to buy with the expectation that these guys are a mess with schedules.  Be flexible.I didn’t have that luxury.Eventually the order did get completed.  However, when you buy with a purpose and they are unable to have basic communication where you make and keep commitments… Sorry. Not the best experience…

I would give it a 1 star review because of the efficiency of getting it done is what saved it. Otherwise it was an absolute waste of money got a piece of loot and took ages to get the mythic complete. I’ll never spend that much for nothing again. Customer support was good.

The service was good and the accomplishment was completed; however, all my UI options had been changed to someone else's choices not mine. My options in WOW are completely messed up! having a hard time resetting them back to my preferences. DO NOT CHANGE PEOPLES STUFF!!!

Review.Titre: boosters rolling on gear they dont need
Review.Contenu: The raid was run relatively smoothly no worries there, but when you have about 14 people paying around $70 or in my case 100 i think its bad that the boosters that are over 400 ilvl are rolling on gear they dont need

Review.Titre: Raid was cleared, but no gear
Review.Contenu: The raid itself went extremely smooth, however, only 5 people weren’t locked to the instance so maybe 4 pieces dropped from the entire run. I wouldn’t recommend anyone pay the money for a standard run.

Review.Titre: Not professional.  Waste your time.  Eventually get the job done though.
Review.Contenu: Beware of these guys.  They deliver eventually but they are never on time and they do not communicate.Most recently they disbanded a 6.30pm raid at 9.20pm with no communication.When I asked what was happening on Discord, they said we would reform in 20 minutes and to stay at my PC.  After 40 minutes of waiting they said I’d be scheduled for 11.30pm.  At 11.25pm they messaged and said they would be 50 minutes.They are over stacking the raid with boostees requiring them to split raids.  And because of that they wasted my entire night.This isn’t the first time I’ve had to deal with their lack of communication.Like I said, they eventually get the job done, but waste a lot of time with lack of organization and communication.

Review.Titre: Didn't get promised amount of loot.
Review.Contenu: Advertised minimum raid loot of 4 pieces. Even ran me a second time, didn't get a 4th piece and they said loot that I didn't even get counted towards my promised loot kind of a shady move.

This was the second time in a row that WoWVendor completely forgot about my booking - everything. They forgot the time. They forgot the looters. The run day and time was scheduled several days in advance. I messaged their customer service an hour BEFORE to make sure everything was ready. They were really slow to respond, and were not giving details. My scheduled run time came, and it went. Then a half hour later I finally had enough with them ignoring my messages and being 30 minutes late. Customer service responded saying their entire "run team" was in........ a storm with no internet connection? I said that was a lie, and they need to get someone out there immediately to do my run or I'm going to contest the charge on my card. FINALLY, an hour late and after demanding to get what I paid for, they managed to get people out to do the run with the 2 loot traders (which I had to make sure they provided because they likely would have forgotten). I am now extremely skeptical of this service. You've been warned.  The players doing the run were good and had no issues with the dungeon. But the organization here is non-existent.

Review.Titre: Timelines that are on their website…
Review.Contenu: Timelines that are on their website have not been correct. Lots of delays, over 1 hour sometimes. If you don't check in for your run, you might not get an invite at all. Customer service is very nice, but still wasting a lot of time.
Was not a smooth run. I have had multiple runs done amazing  but this one has been the worst. reconsidering not doing another it was that bad.

The layers of obscurity and secrecy around contacting anyone are a bit too much. I missed a raid run today because nobody had contacted me to schedule the start time. I understand that the players need to be protected from bans, but I gave you four ways to contact me - the Wowvendor website, email,  Discord, and my Blizzard account. All I needed was "Hey, we're gonna start at [time], and [player] will invite you."Instead, what I got was a random raid invite while I was doing dailies in the world, without any forewarning that it was for the run, or that the run was even happening on this day. In the current state of world content, that's simply not enough. I get random invites all the time while out in the world. Anyway, this run has been quickly rescheduled with little struggle. This is an acceptable, but frustrating, outcome.
Job was done, completed in a untimely manner. Account went unused for 36 hours that could've been spent gaming. Meh.

The group did well, but 1 item for 31 boss kills was definitely not worth the money, I wouldn't recommend paying for raid runs unless it's with people feeding gear. Won't be doing that again.Low review is for the $$ spent for the reward. The group did fine.

5 ret pallys boosties in a single raid.  would have been more but 1 boostie dropped before raid start.  Wowvendor has a system in place  to prevent this but simple didnt use it.  I feel completely ripped off

Competent Clear - Loot barriers.So I've purchased and reviewed 100's if not 1000's of clears over the years. This was not the worst service. The group was competent, and cleared the content. The normal run took about 1.75 hours which was a little slow.The big issue. If you do not purchase premium services towards loot, you will not just roll against other carries. You will also roll against the carry members. Such as one of their healers rolling and winning a DPS trinket, clearly a heavily geared DPS rolling and winning plate. Until the final boss which I have experience on regardless of my poor damage on a new character was when the carriers versus the carries were really determined as the whole raid rolled on everything they could, whether to sell separately, or to collude to piloted characters.I would HIGHLY suggest purchasing carries elsewhere, where there are far more clear lines on what to expect. This is obviously a tactic to encourage you to return to service to purchase a premium service once you get that loot itch.

Review.Titre: Run was stacked with other plate…
Review.Contenu: Run was stacked with other plate buyers. No attempt to balance the buyers across the runs.

It took my booster 4 days to log in, once logged in they didn’t play for 2 days bc of a blackout…I asked several different times to change boosters and was unable to. This entire experience took almost 2 weeks to go 8 levels. I could have done this faster on my own. I got no compensation even tho I was told I would get gold credit. However my bf paid for this the same day I did, also needing 8 levels and his booster was done in 3 days. I guess it’s just luck of the draw?

Review.Titre: Their raiders roll need on loot!
Review.Contenu: Their runners will roll need on items that they want, even if a paying customer needs it as well. You literally have to compete against the people being paid to run you through a raid. I brought this to their attention and they basically said "we will take your comments into consideration when we adjust our loot rules" and let the runner keep the BiS spell dmg dagger (who was resto druid the whole raid). I would check with competitors first before choosing them to ensure you're not fighting a bunch of runners for loot!

The boosters are good, and I used to whole heartedly recommend. Now I can’t. The last run felt really bad. The rolling system they use now could see you getting nothing while another who paid same price can get 5+ items. At that rate, don’t pay and just use the finder.
Team was nearly an hour late at starting, and extremely slow on kill times. 4/10 will not boost again. Not worth the money spent.

Review.Titre: A plea to update raiding services
Review.Contenu: I primarily use WowVendor's raid services to gear alts and my experiences have been mostly positive.Recently, there were changes to loot distribution in WoW but WoWVendor hasn't adjusted their services to reflect these changes with regard to gear funneling and competition for loot overall.There are no cutoffs regarding roster slots for armor types nor main spec roles in the carries that make up a standard group. In the latest raid, this meant that I was rolling against 6-7 others for every piece of gear. Suffice to say, it didn't go well.The advanced option is still there but true funneling for gear type no longer occurs.That leaves the premium option but I cannot justify the price for content that will be obsolete in a little over a week.My other complaint is the sheer number of carries permitted in each run. Since most self-plays are relatively fresh toons, we are essentially dead weight. The fights are buffed to reflect the extra bodies and this means not only longer run times in general, but multiple wipes on the final bosses.WoWVendor generally offers great services but I think I will be taking on pass on their raiding options unless they update their practices.

Review.Titre: Missed 2x time slots for the runs
Review.Contenu: Missed 2x time slots for the runs, both confirmed prior to by support and discord. Asked for a refund, waiting to receive it. Have spent thousands with these guys, but this time I did not receive the service they usually give. My recommendation would be to ensure staff know and honor the times given as for someone like myself, I'm busy and arrange my schedule accordingly.

Ran a Jailer run and found out later that all the runners had already looted boss for the week. Understandable as they run several runs a day but when your needed loot doesnt drop and there is no one else looting the bosses it leaves a bad taste in your mouth knowing you paid 18 dollars for a boss kill. Will be my last purchase here as I just dont feel the value from the service provided.

Review.Titre: Getting in to the raid raidwas very prompt…
Review.Contenu: Getting in to the raid was very prompt but the person running it seemed very new to doing it , there was 4 wipes on one boss and a few others wipe on other bosses.  I have used this service before with out any problems it just seemed this lead was new

Didn't meet the guaranteed items, they don't even match you with your own class (to ensure if the module drops, for teir gear, you receive it) and saw 3-4 modules drop with my gear traders that couldn't even trade because they were on paladin / death knight.

Review.Titre: No loot trading on basic package
Review.Contenu: Went on a full heroic mode SoD. Raid was on time, didn’t wipe, completed the run quickly. I chose the basic option, and ended the whole raid with 1 piece of loot (just bad luck). I noticed the raid would not trade anything, even if no one else in the raid needed it (there were 2+ items I could have used that got vendored instead). If they were nice about it and traded I would have bought more runs but not now. Thankyou though, achievement was good.

I usually have great service with this business but the last couple of orders have been mediocre at best.  They didn’t update me on when my order was complete or show me a video of the 6 hour farming periods (which they have done in the past).  I recommend always uploading the farming videos to YouTube and providing a link to the customer.

Review.Titre: took 2 hours on phone to set new raid…
Review.Contenu: took 2 hours on phone to set new raid time, also had to accept a different raid

Buyer Beware, buying a Raid boost with traders only gets you loot up until the last boss. Last boss is not included, which they do not make known until after you purchase. Aside from that, everything was good.

Review.Titre: Use to be the best now just SO-SO
Review.Contenu: The run was fine until the last boss which I understand they have to wait a couple of hours like it says on the website, but when I asked support they said it would be 3 days, if that is going to be the case then make sure the person who is buying the boost knows before they purchase it, In my case Sunday doesn't work for me since I will be out of town until reset.

Pros: At the end of the run the service was as advertised. The loot guarantee was met. Cons: started late, a number of wipes in the second to last boss, skipping large amounts of trash reducing BOE chancesI won't be doing this again. The overall experience was both rushed and boring.Edited to expand on my initial review and mention that WowVendor is getting pushy regarding my previous 3 star review. I feel that if they want a 5 star review, then they should provide 5 star service for the amount they charge. They did provide 3 star service initially; but after reaching out to me to express their dissatisfaction with my review, I feel I need to drop a star due to customer service.I am not looking for rebates, discounts, or any recompense here. This is my honest review.

Leveling took place in the specified timeUnfortunately a large part of my gold was used and apparently no gold was produced so that one claims to have spent 140gold for skills for lv 56Leveling was only from 54 to 60 ..... The gold was missing in a subject at the end of the 58 and 60 skills I also had to buy.Equipment was not purchased with it; my consumables were also used

Awful run. Compared to my usual 5 star experience with WowVendor boosts, this one was just terrible.Nobody bothered to answer any questions, everyone played like they were forced to be there at gunpoint, the whole group died many many times, to the point where we were almost not finishing the dungeon in time.Just an awful experience. Maybe others get boosts simply for the loot but if the boost makes you feel like trash and not even part of the game.. that sucks.

Review.Titre: I've used this company for many boosts…
Review.Contenu: I've used this company for many boosts before, but the last 3 times I've utilized them, they have messed up my keybinds and hotbars despite specifically asking this not be done.  I come home from work and log in for raid, only to be stuck re-fixing all my setup and UI.  They did provide the boost I paid for, but after a 3rd time of this happening after asking for it not to, I felt I needed to leave a comment on this.

Review.Titre: I had ADVANCED Personal Loot GUARANTEE
Review.Contenu: I had ADVANCED Personal Loot.  they claim there will be 3 non-saved boosters of your Armor Type (cloth, leather, mail or plate), who are going to trade you ALL GEAR and WEAPONS they receive during the raid. They GUARANTEE: at least 5+ items in different slots. I receive not one piece of gear from anyone during this raid and when I asked about this all I got was silence.

Review.Titre: I have used them before and had good…
Review.Contenu: I have used them before and had good experiences but this time has been awful. I ordered a wow classic PL and it has been 3 days so far without it even being started. I tried to contact via discord and live chat for answers and have not received any answers. Normally great service, but this has been very bad.

Review.Titre: You had to download Skype or Discord to…
Review.Contenu: You had to download Skype or Discord to purchase services. I didn’t have either so started a Discord account and it was never used for the Argus kill I purchased. I lay dead for the whole encounter but I did get the achievement and mount which I’m very happy about. So why Skype or Discord when it was never used for instructions.
Expensive , none communicative experience Never again

Bought power-lvling last Saturday and still haven’t hear anything from them? I am loosing valuable time and have no idea if they are able or willing to do it. My patience is gone and now I want my money back, but again it’s impossible to get in touch with them.  If they was upfront with, that they are overworked I would have understand that. I regret this decision and would advise people to not buy. And to Wowvendor please sort out your mess ASAP!Update! It seems that they are fixing it and Iam getting refunded. Thanks for fixing it.

Review.Titre: Was supposed to start at 7PM EST we did…
Review.Contenu: Was supposed to start at 7PM EST we did not start till 7:45 pm EST, they originally told me at 7 invites were going out, 15 minutes later they said they ran into issues and would start at 7:30, this did not happen about 15 minutes later at 7:45 we finally got started. This is really poor experience.

Review.Titre: They advertised a special raid for Fiendish Hellfire Infernal Core.
Review.Contenu: They advertised a special raid for a rare mount Fiendish Hellfire Infernal Core. 24 hours later I had not heard anything and time had run out to do this particular raid. This is the 2nd time I had purchased a raid or dungeon and there was no communication other than to confirm the purchase.

Review.Titre: I've ordered an Uldir boost and left my…
Review.Contenu: I've ordered an Uldir boost and left my contact information. Three days have passed and no one has contacted me, the order hasn't been completed yet and the money has been paid.If it's not completed by Wednesday I will request a full refund. Disgusting attitude to the client.

Update: Run complete, but very late. Communication is a large issue with these guys/customer support is quick to blame the customer rather than take ownership for their own mistakes. The actual runners are decent, so if you can get ahold of them, it’s not a bad service.

Ordered 24 hour leveling service - its been 2 days and I'm still waiting for them to START the process. Very disappointing, paying for a timed service and not receiving it in the specified time is the same as only getting a partial service. Can't say I'd recommend in the future.

I was left waiting nearly an hour before I was finally informed that I would not be invited to the raid and the raid would be rescheduled outside of my availability.The WowVendor discord user was courteous, but ultimately unable to resolve the issue.  I was forced to seek a refund.

Review.Titre: Boost was completed almost two days…
Review.Contenu: Boost was completed almost two days later than proposed. Customer Service argued with me about the difference between "ETA" and "deadline" I received absolutely no updates when asked about my character. I had to have a friend log on to my account to tell me that, despite the boost originally intended to be completed the day before, my character was still level 51. Once they finally did finish my boost, my character was still renown 1, even though in the past when they boosted the character always ended at renown 5. Horrible job by the booster, and a horrible job by customer service. I will be charging back the paypal transaction.

I did the personal loot run and it was good, so I decided to do a premium loot heroic.  It wasn't really as advertised.  I did get the amount of loot I was supposed to, but they traded trinkets and weapons to guildmates instead of carries that were paying.

Spent to much time on their page, seeing payment error on 3 differ browsers, with all da sh!t disabled at the end, ended up with last slot taking, after i took the pp way - Lol a joke, used 1 hour +. CS nice  to talk to tho.

Review.Titre: Wowvendor.com is simply not interested in providing a good customer experience.
Review.Contenu: Unfortunately, this is the best rating I can give this vendor despite many, many purchases over the last year.  Their rude responses, or lack of response, missed commitments, etc. have simply become too much.  I will move on but felt its important others know before purchasing a service from wowvendor.com.To be clear, they did refund my money when I requested it, and that's a credit to them.  I simply expect more from those I purchase a service from in the way of a good customer experience.  I am happy to provide a screenshot of the most recent interaction I had with them to prove my point.

Completed my order on time. However, the individual who played my character switched around all of my key bindings. They also boosted the wrong spec (not a huge deal). Disappointed that such a reputable website let this fly.

I bought a 2.2k arena achieve for my character last season. Waited all season after the boost was done. Which took a quite awhile to get started. The customer service guy was rude and sassy and very unhelpful. I was contacted at the end of the season by a World Of Warcraft GM and my account recieved a mark agiainst it for using illegal people to help on the account. AKA wowvendor, the GM told me they could see the IP the wowvendor boosters were logging on from and removed my achieves and titles from that season I paid for and there was nothing I could do about it! Dont get caught out in the rain, dont gamble with these gents.

Review.Titre: This site is definitely not safe if…
Review.Contenu: This site is definitely not safe if you're going to buy any of their Powerleveling services I recommend you do not get them you will get banned 100% as I've already been banned for using these guys services.

Review.Titre: Honestly wasn't the best order I've…
Review.Contenu: Honestly wasn't the best order I've had. Took way too long for what it was and there wasn't any communication unless I initiated. Probably won't be ordering from WV again

Review.Titre: Key not in time like the Service itself
Review.Contenu: The Service Itself was okay. I was "AFK" and Still nearly Intime.Big negativ: The Waiting Time I buyed 1st Week and I get it 3-4 Week so I got It on my Main myself, so its a Wasted Money.
Smooth run . Just noticed a habbit of starting 1/2 hour to hour late on my last few runs.  If they want my money they will need to start at the advertised time . My time is worth money too right .

Review.Titre: Did the job but in what a way...
Review.Contenu: Did the job but in what a way...Did the Mythic Run but changed all the keybinding, talents and action-bars.Took me over a bloody hour to get back to my game. For that price I wished a much better service.
1st heroic run was good. I did 2 more after that and and zero loot after 16 bosses and they didn't even roll bonuses as i requested. Maybe it was bad luck but it just didn't feel right.

Review.Titre: I bought the Mage Tower Challenge and …
Review.Contenu: I bought the Mage Tower Challenge and after  3 days while The Event was active . No attempts were made even thou they said they would start on each Day .I cant recommend these Vendor Services .

Unfortunately there were many problems this time...The service itself was perfect, don't get me wrong. I got what I ordered.But the way to it was a pain in the a... my whole interface was messed up, afterwards. No excuses, whatsoever... only talking out of it and giving responsibility away. What a bs! Had expected much more... starting with a 'sorry' or maybe refund or special offer for next service. Nothing! That is so dissappointing. Communication with customer service was difficult anyway. I always had to ask about the state of my service. That was so much better last time.I almost had to reinstall my whole game and addons... and you guys just ignored me.As a matter of fact I am not quite sure if I order again. Sorry guys! But you can do much better.

Pretty ordinary. Got the level boost for Dragonflight, only got up to the 2nd last zone on the Campaign so now I still need to do that. Also changed all my keybindings so had to reset them all. Better off just doing it myself if they dont even do the campaign

Booked a H ToS 9/9 full clear on Alliance for 13/08  @ 6pmThe booking itself was good, no issues and was contacted to be online at the agreed start time. Received my invite on time and raid formed. This was the last of the smooth running,  I am not sure if this was a new group but we  took close to the 3 allocated hours and wiped 7 times (1x Maiden, 3x Avatar and 4 x KJ. With only around 4-5 carries in the group it seemed odd, even the hosts were dying to mechanics. I have used other services before and was completed in half the time and zero wipes.   I expect and understand some issues occur, mistakes etc but i would also expect a cleaner run when you pay for the convenience. All in all, nice guys, easy service but not happy with quality of product and will return to the previous used service next time.

Review.Titre: Get results but it is odd...
Review.Contenu: Before sharing this review, I am a huge pvp fan. I stopped for a couple of years and just wanted to see a good RBG group for Alliance again.I purchased 1 RBG on Saturday around 2:30pm EST. I didn't receive an invite until around 8pm EST on Monday, that is after me having to contact the site. I was excited and ready to actually fight the Horde, however, the Horde never came...Crazy thing is we won an RBG because there was no opposing team....The customer service was great from the site. It was awkward because not a single person spoke in the raid group and no invites were given to speak in Vent, Discord, Skype, or Team Speak. I guess if you are looking for boring wins with no action, then buy runs. In the end I feel like they are not earning my funds, just a way of cheating somehow. I am fine with running my main with pugs and actually enjoy the action.
2nd time using their service. This time arena 3s. Carry lead was a jerk, and I've learned my lesson using this company - won't happen again.

Very little communication throughout the process. Wasn't even sure I'd get my refund. The chat on the website kept asking me to use the chat in discord. Problem is though that the discord person takes forever to respond.This is a difficult thing for me to do because I've used the services before and they were prompt with delivery. This is just completely inexcusable for a repeat customer and an easy way to develop a horrible reputation.EDIT to the reply:This site does not have a support team. Once you do try to contact them, they tell you to goto a different person on discord. Only problem now is that I can't talk to anyone on discord because I've been blocked. Great Customer Service.......EDIT 2:So they're doing their best to make up for the service. We've rescheduled. Until then I'll make this review a 2 star instead of a 1 star. Will rewrite this review after the service has been completed.

Review.Titre: 2 people leave chat, third one says wrong info, they havent updated parts of site in 2 years
Review.Contenu: so short version: 3 chats, 2 people leave mid conversation, 2,5 hours later still no asnwer to my question, and website not updated in 2 years. Hi I contacted the site to ask for 3 simple thing about their sale items: how much for 2k rating boost + 6 hours of coaching, and how much for vicious saddle boost. this should be easy to answer right? First chat with bella whisperwind, after my 2nd reply she took 30 min afk. I ask where she is after those 30 min. Waited mroe, and she left. Then I talked with Atalan or something. He introduced himself and says Hi, I copy pasted the convo so it was easy to get context and continue his parters chat. 10 minutes and DC from him too. Then, 3rd chat in 2 hours, I click Reconnect again after he DC-s. Now Nathan Fireheart or some similar name comes. I put it as simply as I can, third time. He asnwers last question and says vicious saddle isn't obtainable so it was removed. That's untrue and it's  come back since patch 8.1 after filling progress bar twice you get it. Now he claims "its out of stock, it says so on the product.". That is also wrong, the only description is "slots left" under price. Then i realise they havent updated the website in 2+ years since vicious saddle was removed from game. I ask why and he says They dont remove it when the item isn't obtainable anymore, and didnt update status eithere. only care to write review so other people dont waste Time and any normal person would be raging

Fast run! Great customer service. Will use again

Review.Contenu: All you can count on is the flight stones and crests on a m+ run

Review.Contenu: I liked that this ws legit and they did what was agreed upon. Communication was always responsive and positive. What I didn't like was that there was zero timetable or estimate of time completed. I also didn't like that the name I provided to them was unavailable so they just added an extra letter at the end of the name, instead of asking me first what they should do.

Review.Titre: My only problem with WoWVender is a…
Review.Contenu: My only problem with WoWVender is a lack of communication. After I paid for a carry several days before, the payment sat on pending for some unknown reason and I couldn't get an explanation as to why. American Express said the payment went through on their end. When I finally did get a team invite several days later, it completly out of the blue and I was confused as I hadn't even discussed a day or time to run a M+ with anyone yet, so I didn't know who this player inviting me was or what they wanted. A quick introduction would have cleared things right up.

Review.Titre: Good carry but ETA delay communication
Review.Contenu: the first thing im going to say , is that the performance of the persons who take you to the carry is amazing. they do just perfect . the main area of oportunity will fall on the ETA time . I paid for the express completion service and because of ¨a high queue¨ i needed to wait a little bit longer than expected.     - what impacted me the most is that I needed to be the one contacting the customer service team to find out that there was a delay instead of them letting me know in advance.

Review.Titre: Got the job done but lack of…
Review.Contenu: Got the job done but lack of communication.  They finished in very good time, but I didn't know they were done because they never told me.  Also, the booster ruined my interface setup and I had to spend 30 minutes fixing it.

Bought 4 mythic 10 runs which went quickly, however no gear was traded to me even when it was not an upgrade for the boosters.  Result was a small bump in my mythic + rating.Would generally recommend buying in game with gold as a result as the people there tend to trade the loot

The service itself was just ok. Did I get what I was after, yes. The runs averaged 20 minutes late with my third one running a full hour behind. Leaders were pretty uncommunicative. I expected timeliness and a minor amount of instruction.

They got my service mixed up with another service, asked for a code to get in my acct multiple times jus to not get on my acct till the next day.. would get on with no notifications but then sometimes notify me.. did the job great and did the job fast, but then I was saving exotic engrams for light fall and I had about 15 in the post master and they ran my services and pushed out all but 2 of my exotics I was grinding for.. jus wish they paid attention a little more to peoples account and what they have..

Review.Titre: Bought a normal raid full run and 15 timed key
Review.Contenu: Bought a normal raid full run. Went through 7/8 Bosses then kicked from the group. Was told to wait for another group. This was never communicated. Waited an hour before I got an invite to the next group. I also bought a timed15 M+ key. The group didn't time the key. That was ok but they refused to run another key and kicked me from the group. I had to talk with customer support to figure out when I can get my timed 15 key I paid for. Took an hour to be told that I had to wait till the next day to get another run. The customer support didn't know when I'll get the run the next day. Was told finally when the run will be the next day after asking support again.
I added two loot traders, but didnt recieve the trinket that dropped. No ise to add loot traders.

I really appreciated the response on finding the group but would have preferred an actual carry team instead of a stacked tank only. We had several wipes from having little dps and a struggling healer
It was no so nice for the price of 84€ i hoped thaa the booster an unsaved for more loot but they wasnt this is a bit sad but alll other things where good

Review.Titre: I purchased the mythic+ bulk deal for…
Review.Contenu: I purchased the mythic+ bulk deal for timed 16. I thought I was getting 4 different dungeons, but what I got were 2 dungeons both of which we ran twice. I was a little disappointed.
I liked that every fight was clean with no wipes. I disliked that the standard loot was very bad (only 1 item per boss) since most of the raid already killed the boss. Thanks
Runs were fantastic during VOTI, but have gone way downhill in S2.  Not sure what has changed, but I will be looking for a new boost service, that is for sure.

Run was fine, deal should have disclosed the amount of loot too be rolled on. Raid that size should have been at least 4 pieces of loot per boss, there was only two. Don’t believe the amount I paid was worth it for the gear that was actually useful for me.

Was told they would start immediately but close to 40 minutes later. The group I had wasn’t as good as others but they did good   If you choose a Random you can pretty much bet it’s gonna be a Temple. They seem to love that one
Quick and easy kill. Did have a later start than on my order. Also was the first time there was no loot to roll for which was not the the case in past runs.
Slow service, slow response. Lack of coordination with booster. Compared to another website I use the communication isn’t the greatest.
Just had to wait 2 Days after purchasing a sherpa :( and got didn’t get any guns in the raid but the people were nice!

Review.Contenu: The raid portion was done very well. The keys on the other hand I felt were very poorly run, with very little time management.
