Review.Contenu: The players were good at what they do but planning the raids is too difficult as a paying customer I believe they should try to work with your schedule I provided 8:30am-12:30pm and 8-10pm daily and even offered the afternoon but was unable to get it set up. Started partially into the raid about second encounter then asked if I wanted to go back. I guess when I pay for a service I expect more effort to make the experience a good one.

Review.Titre: Just wish the sherpas would explain in…
Review.Contenu: Just wish the sherpas would explain in detail each encounter. I would like to do more than staying in one spot . I don't feel like I'm learning that much

Review.Titre: timely,well executed, poor communication in raid
Review.Contenu: The raid was timely and well executed. At a base level the experience was fine.  There is 0 communication within raid, and too much is unclear. Every single item I needed dropped but it dropped for another assigned loot trader. The one I was given looted 4 out of 5 items for me, 0 of the ones I needed. When i asked how the final piece would be given I was told "items you loot count towards the total." Idk it just kinda sucked every item I needed dropped and every item I needed went to the other Hunter.

Had a boost for Trials and it was scheduled for 4 am, since I'm in the US, and had to wait until 5. Which was already late as it is, for me. Mods in Discord were a little slow, as well. Apparently it was backed up due to an October promotion.  Make sure to double-check the light level before signing up because I forgot the detail not including Artifact Level!Once it started it was speedy and they were efficient. Can verify it wasn't a scam.
Team was ready kind of sucked that there wasn’t a funnel option but it worked

One of the few times I haven't had the best experience after purchasing a raid with trade ppl. They used to tell you who the other leather trades were and who would be giving you their loot. I was given a piece of loot that didn't fit my spec and it was called a "bonus" and as soon as I spoke to them on discord, some foot drop was given to me that had dropped from an earlier boss fight. The last raid boss we were told to portal to a spot and wait for the fight to be over, then summoned back for another fight. An hour elapsed during that time. I'm not a very happy camper this time!

Review.Titre: Service not up to usual standard
Review.Contenu: There was a delay of nearly 40 minutes between the 2nd and 3rd runs. Nothing was said about this. When I eventually asked what was happening, all I was told was ‘problem with hunt’.During the last key, one of the dps went afk for at least a third of the run. Again, no explanation provided.This used to be a very professional and reliable service and this particular experience was not up to previous standards.
The waiting time from 2,5h was realy bad. But the Service was perfect.

Review.Titre: The price was fair but communication…
Review.Contenu: The price was fair but communication significantly lacked as it was difficult for the communications person to get a response from a booster. I boosted 3 toons from 50 to 60 and the longest I waited was 36 hours to get a response from the boosters. Time zone difference was only an hours difference as well. It would have been helpful if boosters were more proactive about giving real time updates such as when they logged off they could have given an update as to current level. Overall I would purchase again I think.
Run was late.  Posted 10-20 min delay and then silence after 45 min of waiting I had to contact and ask to be moved to a different spot as they said the other run was still delayed for a bit.

Prompt starting time and invites.  More deaths and wipes than I expected and did not like having to wait 2 days for the last boss kill.  A little expensive compared to others also, especially given the notes above.

Review.Titre: 30 day ban.....However the company did their best to make it right
Review.Contenu: Strike the 5. Account was banned, f me for not wanting to deal with toxic pugsEdit: Still banned, but atleast wow vendor did what they could to make it right. I cant put things back to a 5 because of the ban, but I am pleased that they did what they could to compensate.

Review.Titre: Not as good as they used to be...
Review.Contenu: I have used this company several times over the past couple of years. In the beginning they were great. Now, not so much. I used to be able to order a mythic 15 run and have it completed in a couple of hours at most. Now it takes a week or longer. Not sure what is going on with the group, but they are not as reliable as they used to be.

Thought everything went fine, appeared to be a good service until my account got suspended by Blizzard and I think I have lost the thing they got for me.   I have been contacted by wowvender who have explained that this would have effect all these service companies when they started a banwave, I am very happy with the way wowvender have resolved this issue and I am more angry with Blizzard for what I feel are double standard as they are hardly squeaky clean as a company!

Room for improvement.  I’ve used the leveling boost service several times in the past but this time didn’t seem as good.  They left all kinds of junk and unwanted quest items in my inventory, expired auctions in my mailbox, and didn’t bother changing my spec to what I requested.  However, the amount of time it took to complete my order was very good.  For these reasons, I’m giving 3 stars.

Review.Titre: Finished my Renown for them they had it…
Review.Contenu: Finished my Renown for them they had it all the way to 78 on Saturday, and I asked them what’s the status and they said he’s done for the day at 12 PM. I also leveled the renown from 72-75 the day before Saturday “Friday”. They had 6 days to do 40-80. I also ordered a boost for my friend from them at start time 10 PM and they said no one is available until 12:30 am so we rescheduled to the next day. I’ve used them multiple times just was a little disappointed at this part.

Run was very smooth. Only bad thing was half the people were either saved to KT or didn’t loot so they wouldn’t have to trade. When you buy with gold they sell you KT and sylv loot too. Will do that. Only 1 piece of loot off KT for a group of 16ish and we had 3-4 pieces off every other boss. So kind of ruins personal loot when others are locked

Caution on the GM order.  The new addition of the GM list for Conquerors led to a deceptive description on the service that you'll get a run based on the current active GM for the week.  With access to the list, they have freedom to choose the GM they run.  If you want a certain GM run, you'll need to opt for the Conqueror Seal service at a significantly steeper price point.  Flawed description reported, but until it's updated... understand that the service will be different.  Otherwise, they performed well as always.  No other complaints.  Happy gaming.

Ilvl 230, often dps was keeping up in the top 5, without even a Domination set.  I asked to participate and still did not received heals.  I would often have to heal myself, I'm 8/10M, I know what I'm doing, game is not fun when I'm tanking the floor.   I had made it clear to the RL that I was experienced and wanted to play. I understand runs need to go smooth, and most don't have a clue as to what they're doing.... but still :( That's why the review isn't lower.

Review.Titre: The first booster was from EU and…
Review.Contenu: The first booster was from EU and didn't notify anyone that their net was lagging bad and thus provided a portion of the order which almost cost them a bad review here. Afterward they re-assigned a new person and they completed the order in a very efficient and speedy manner.

Took payment, told me it could take up to 7 days. On day 9 now with no contact.edit: They have contacted me and said they would attempt to correct the issue as soon as possible. Still no resolution but I can understand the difficulties.

Network manipulation? Destiny 2 trials flawless boost. It was ok. Seemed a lot slower than I expected but was still complete. It does not look like the boosters play for you however. Looking at the trials report they got matched up with the same group repeatedly. They use your account to lose to other players then go get your wins. Wish I would have known about this prior to purchase.

Review.Titre: Please speed up the time from payment to service
Review.Contenu: Usually, the team is super fast in getting your run completed. The last two times have been a challenge. The first I had to ask for a refund. The second took 5 days and many instances of me asking for a time so I could plan to be online. I got the run completed, however, it would have been nice to get it sooner as I’d be paying for more runs if it was done timely.I’m sure it will get back to normal, where they are easily a 5, but for now, I can only give a 3. The team doing the work is by far a 5. Super patient, great team work, and efficient when running the event. Kudos to those amazing players for dragging some of us through things to receive our rewards.

All in all, a good service, I recommend them. Three concerns. When I asked when my run would be ready, I was told 20 minutes. Then I was told 1 hour. It happens, but 40 minutes is a big difference. They did fix the issue later on, so that's a plus. The run went a bit slow. Spires of Ascension is usually quick, but it took 70 minutes. Also, our healer wasn't the best. We had 3 or 4 wipes and people died quite a bit. Tank and DPS were solid.

Review.Titre: No contact from Wowvendor of boost....
Review.Contenu: Have had previously good experience with using WowVendor for various things.However, earlier today I purchased a timed +15 boost run for one of my toons...an hour later of sitting on their discord have had no contact at all...Have also e-mailed for an update but got no reply as yet :(Just want alil feedback...

Review.Titre: Although in the end we got the boost…
Review.Contenu: Although in the end we got the boost done, I repeatedly had to reach out to the admins about setting a time and would not get an answer back to the answer I did get was “Let me check” and no follow up.

The run itself went well with no issues. The communication on the other has wasn’t the best. I had to message them to find out when they were starting. Once I contacted them they found a booster who proceeded to attempt to log in. The booster tried multiple times to log into account without VPN. I also had to message and ask if they were done (8 hours later) rather than them telling me when they were done.

This company is highly recommended. They were able to finish my neighbor's orders within a very short period. We were very impressed with how these people worked. They are customer oriented, they worked to ensure that the customers are served effectively. Therefore, this company provides a wonderful job that is recommendable.

Review.Titre: nice run no problems,but the reason am…
Review.Contenu: nice run no problems,but the reason am giving 3 stars., is because we really need to do dungens that would give good gear for the class am playing,i have hand gear at ilvl 425,i would really like to get these to at least 465 and the best dungen is TOS.other then that nice job just wish we could run me thru better dungens for better gear,thank you.

The services are very professional, however if you are doing a rep boost service be aware it is only the zone specific world quests that will be done I.E. If you was Zandalar Troll they will only do the Zuldazar quests not all of the quests. Again they are very professional, but be aware before you buy it will take the same time to do it if you end up doing it.

Review.Titre: It was okay but they delivered
Review.Contenu: It was okay but they delivered. I thought the overall experience wasn't what I expected considering the reviews they get. There weren't much of any communication from the boosters. I had to scream out to the support team to get some services done otherwise I wouldn't get what I paid for. Also, the delivery time took longer than the anticipated delivery time because of the communication issue.

Review.Titre: I did all ten Natharia bosses on heroic…
Review.Contenu: I did all ten Natharia bosses on heroic I was satisfied with everything but the fact that there was another paying customer who was a hunter who was brought along and when we beat Huntsman Altimor and a mystic anima spherule dropped it was given to that hunter no idea why. I’m still stuck with a 194 staff. I ended up with a belt, trinket, neck and bracers that were upgrades if I socket the bracers. My Ilvl went from 106 to 108. It would have been nice to not have another customer getting pretty much exactly what I needed. Otherwise it was as advertised.

Ordered two services that were completed as advertised. My problem is one hour after my account was finished Blizzard suspended my account for 30 days..... I spent $200 and will see if the account will be reverted as Blizzard threatened.Update 04/02/2020: Blizzard didn't remove account gains as threatened so all and all, I am good!

Purchased the 420 boost and I'm fairly satisfied. They did log into my account and reset key bindings on day 1 and did ~1 mythic a day until day 6. On day 6, they did more Mythics and did some Emissary quests & spent my prismatic manapearls upgrading junk Benthic gear to scrape out the last few iLvls and I wasn't really thrilled about that. But, they did technically get me to 420 within 7 days, so not sure what I expected.

Review.Titre: Other than purposefully killing us when…
Review.Contenu: Other than purposefully killing us when we were shrunk on High Tinker Mekkatorque the raid went smoothly.  They did this to me twice because I was dumb enough to self rez before I realized what they were doing.  Better to tell someone to stand in something and die than to purposefully kill them.  Left a very bitter taste in my mouth for the raid overall.

Original order had a waiting time of a week. A lot of hassle getting it changed to another service. Once the boost was underway it was good. Did the 8/10 mythic boost. 4 pieces of 340 gear for upgrades The 8 mythics took us just over 3hrs, including time taken to get from one to the next etc (I chose the self play option)Just a shame about the dicking about changing the order

So, I've ordered an M10 run in Timer. I've asked the customer support if they have any Loot Trader option available. They've told me that they trade all loot. So why am I upset? Well, I'm wearing mail armor. And nobody in my party was wearing mail. I wasn't lucky on the loot drops and at the end of the dungeon, the rogue gave me the leather item. That's it. M10 run in timer for 1 item that's not even my armor type.Other than that, everything went great.

Glory of Uldir achievement run Run completed in around 1hr 20m in a very efficient manner Sadly however - if gear upgrades you could use drop for the guys doing the boosting (that they clearly do not need but would be great for you!)  any attempts to ask for them to be traded go ignored. Not even acknowledged and politely declined. Completely ignored. Mention this to someone on wowvendors discord chat and get nonsense replies Shame

The services that they provide lately are spotty at best but they still accomplish your order eventually.It seems like they cant get their Sh!t straight anymore. Was rescheduled 3 times in one day 15 minutes apart .. If you pick a specific time they seem to feel it is not their obligation to fulfill said times.Why do you let people pick there own schedule if you are just going to change it.

Review.Titre: The carry told me to stay dead and not…
Review.Contenu: The carry told me to stay dead and not release for the last ~8.5 minutes. They finished the dungeon without me, I didn’t get to experience any of the last boss. Wasn’t very communicative at the end but finally after 2-3 tries and 6-7 minutes I made it to the chest and got my loot etc

For future reference when someone orders a premium run that guarantees them 7 pieces of loot make sure you tell them personal loot counts towards that 7 pieces. Because I thought we were supposed to be traded everything from the boosters especially seeing how I spent close to a $1000 this month with you guys but yea no hard feelings.

I like the effectiveness once I get the run, but the the price point per run is steep and I always seem to get a dungeon I don't need with other members in the team being different gear type than mine. Also, I bought a raid with paypal recently and it somehow also accidentally charged my girls card for a raid..... didn't want a complaint ruin my chance at runs in the future so didn't press it. I still haven't got any deals in my emails either. That all being said < they are really good at what they do once the action starts.

There was absolutely no attempt to include the customer characters in the combat of raids. No cauldrons. No feasts. No healthstones. Absolutely no healing. I died in all but one boss fights and several times to AOE from trash. It was not very enjoyable to die 20 seconds into fights and watch. Spent over 750 gold in repairs.

Two wipes on the dogs. Three wipes on Varimathras. Was not as smooth as my run earlier in the week. It was done by the same Guild oh no not again maybe they just weren't into it. I was excited because I bought the run for my fiancee and saw that it was the same guild that had such a smooth run before. Only to wipe repeatedly..

Poor Service - In Accurate Website ReportingAfter Making Post was contacted by their rep, and provided with a time. Asked to change review, I have updated review and will do a further updated once all services paid for are provided.Was not impressed to pay for a service up front and have website state next raid was starting in 1 hour, only to speak with someone in Discord and be told we have to schedule you for the 10th at 2PM EST or the 12th 2PM EST. (I work 9 to 5 MST)

Great carries as always, customer service was a kinda rude when I was trying to get the initial run started (bought the wrong carry but was “fixed” Minutes later.) a day after the scheduled time I got to get a carry. I Should remember next time to wait a minute to read over an order before purchasing again.

I really like WowVendor but the last Heroic Argus was kind of weird. The fog cone was placed erratic. I do think they should lower the price about $10 since Argus is so easy and be competitive with other carry services. Also would be nice to have more US based raids to join in. The last few have been, I believe in Russia.

Well, first purchase... delayed already. they said were gonna start soon, then i spent my time waiting and nothing. So I logout and they pmed me offline calling for the boost... I saw that only when I got back into the game and they delayed again to 7 days later lol first and only one purchase

Quick and effective boost, but was a bit disappointed that there were no classes that matched my armor type for sharing items at the end.I'm positive they had characters to make this possible, but decided to log on mediocre geared characters instead.All in all good experience though.

Review.Titre: It was a good service, but...
Review.Contenu: It was a good service. Guys were friendly enough and helped newbies get around the dungeon/instance.However it's quite expensive when compared to the fact that you can have a better geared and more experienced guild like the 'Honestly' Guild (one of the top guilds in the world), do it for 300K gold.

I know I wasn't "contributing" to the run but once I died I wasn't sure what to do.  Do I release and run back?  Do I get a rez?  Do I wait?   Once run starts there is no communication until its over.  Is it too much to ask for a little clarity?

Review.Titre: Not enough bang for the buck,
Review.Contenu: Everything was handled quickly and the run went well. I was a bit disappointed that all loot earned during the run was not given to me as 2 items dropped for others in the group that were not upgrades for them but were for me and I was told afterwards that they don’t trade personal loot items. This greatly reduced the bang for the buck for me. You need to spell that out in the details on your website. In the end the cost is too much for what I got from the run so I will probably not be a return customer.

Beware.  The wheels have come off with Shadowlands.  These guys used to be great but are not keeping up with Shadowlands demand.  If you want help with new stuff, I would strongly recommend waiting until they have had more time to get their act together.

Run was completed on time, however, loot that could have been traded to me was not. Dropped group immediately when I asked about the loot being traded to me, said: "Sorry, can't trade" and bounced.I had already inspected and loot was lower ilvl than what was equipped.

Once again great communication and successful run.  Keep in mind you aren't guaranteed to get every piece of gear you want.  They will get you through the content and do a great job every time.  Highly recommend this service. Don't expect upgrades without paying extra for the gear.

Review.Titre: Legion flying done,but don't touch/delete any active quests.
Review.Contenu: Overall,they got the Legion flying achievement down perfectly. The only reason I gave it 3 stars,is because now my Cataclysm Legendary staff quest has been removed from the quest log along with it's (horrendously long)progress. Please don't mess with my quest log like that again.

Placed an order for 8/10 Mythic 0 on 24AUG18 and it was started immediately via shared access.When 48 hours elapsed I contacted them on discord for an update and was informed it wasn’t completed, and they’re starting now.  On the 56 hour mark they completed the order.  Only communication with them was at the start, restart, and completion.  I initiated conversation for the restart. VPN was not used according to Authenticator logs, unless it’s a VPN set to Russia.However, they delivered the described service + 8 hours over the max estimated time.

Review.Titre: Silence on skype, but they got it done
Review.Contenu: It was my first time using a boost, I messaged them on Skype expecting to get some kind of  info on how it was going to go, what they would do and so on, but they just asked for log in info, and then silence after that. Three hours later they said they were done. Would have liked a, “okay we’re in, and will get back to you when its done” just to know that everything was ok. The lack of info didn’t really help a skeptic first time user. Nonetheless they got it done, and Im happy about that, would just have liked a bit more info on what was going on.

Review.Titre: When I have the second last run of…
Review.Contenu: When I have the second last run of leveling, I told my booster to kill bosses also, but he said in the next term, but somehow, I think he knows that as I become 120, he will not kill any bosses of freehold. In our last run, he said he would kill, but as I turn 120, he died and logoff and like vanish from the server only. That's how you treat your clients or buyer. It very disappointing that your booster didn't listen to me. I also said after 10th run can we kill bosses please but he is least interested in those. I have two more char to level up, and now I think if this is your service, should I take it or what?

Was a quick, silent run. Wasn't sure what was going on, but it got done. Through no fault of the runner, I only got one piece of loot, but oh well. Lots of deaths because I had no idea what was happening and there was no communication.

Started about 15 minutes late.  Raid seemed a little thin at heroic had like 12-13 plus 6 customers.  Beginning went pretty smoothly around Ra-den lost some main folks composition changed.  Went down to 10 plus 6 customers had some wipes, then it looked like someone contacted someone and we had like 4 or 5 added to the main group as well as the 6 customers seemed to stabilize everything and finished the raid. Not terribly bad but probably could have gone smoother.  Previous raids was usually around 20 plus 5-6 customers much smoother than running with a significantly smaller raid.  Still seems to be the go to group in general.

Review.Titre: Even a TINY bit of communication would…
Review.Contenu: Even a TINY bit of communication would go a LONG way to changing that 3 Star Rating to a 5.I wasn't provided with any information about how the process was supposed to work (it did work, though) and my attempts to ask for information were not answered.
The group did neither resurrect nor wait for me in the middle of the dungeon. This means that I could not get through in fight! Only wait dead until the group finishes the dungeon is not enough!

Was given a start time which was not met. Got into the group 20minutes late and then had a further 15minutes of waiting for the rest of the boosters to join the group. Then had 3 wipes during the one boss. Not the best experience but got KJ down in the end.

Update: purchased a +10 again. It was with a different group than before. Had to go off spec. Unfortunately i was a bit off my game and pulled an extra pack or two. They handled it better than nasty pugs. HOWEVER, dont expect them to trade you loot from the dungeon chest that they get. The person looted a 395 from the chest and wouldnt trade it. So DO NOT expect any other loot but your own. The site is kind of decieving. Original; Purchased a M+10 run. I was hesitant at first. However the lead in the group did a great job of communicating and getting things running. Within about 10 minutes of paying, I was running the dungeon.

The service was quick and efficient, however, my toon was returned to me with my toolbars changed and my hotkeys unbound. Pretty annoying for a service I pay for, you could at least switch things back.

Have had good experiences in the past and will use again. However the people in my group this time were only ok. Completed the run in time but would not have been possible if I hadn’t actually been able to pull my own weight.

Review.Titre: I have used your service several times
Review.Contenu: I have used your service several times. Some of your teams try to heal the carries at least some but some teams prefer us to die as quickly as possible. It is a more enjoyable to participate some. I understand the problem of poor mechanics.

If you go for a raid carry make sure you hit the boss at least once. When you die at boss, do not release. The teams are pros and know what they are doing. As for mystic+ dungeons, stay back as much as  you can. If the trash on the way to Boss , gets you it's unlikely you will catch up. The team moves fast.
They almost always deliver with their runs. And they do offer discounts for any failures and hindrances. Overall it was very productive.
Almost perfect, just dropped a star because we ended up starting almost an hour late. The run itself was great though!! I get it, things happen. But it warrants 4 stars.
Good AS Always, but -1 Star, invite after 30 mins, and more wipes than useually.

Review.Titre: The group did not bring enough people…
Review.Contenu: I was not satisfied with a service I received. While their customer support team did reach out and explain in length that without purchasing a higher package, more players cannot be guaranteed to ensure more than 1 piece of loot drops per boss, they did apologize for the disappointment and offered me a free  +17 run, as a sign of good faith to a long term customer. I really appreciated this gesture. Would still like to see something change so runs with 1 loot drops per boss don't happen.

Review.Titre: Everything was done that was ordered, but took a while
Review.Contenu: Everything was done that was ordered. But had to wait for a couple hours between the 8th and 9th boss for some reason. That wasn’t clear or expected so I had to stay in game much longer than I though.

I've been thru several of these heroic runs with WowVendor without issue, but after the 3rd wipe on the 2nd boss, I said something in Discord. In about a minute the raid was filled with new players and everything from that point on was perfect.

Review.Titre: Only reason I am not giving this review…
Review.Contenu: Only reason I am not giving this review a perfect rating is due to a coordination mix-up. Picked the weekly activities bundle and got invited to raid at the right time but had just started a run with the M+ boosters. The team other wise was just as fantastic as ever. Rescheduled raid and M+ timed and loot shared even after a (personal-my fault) mishap that caused a bad handoff.

The runners and customer service are always great. Some groups more friendly than others. The mythic plus service is wonderful and you end up with a good amount of loot. The raid services leave more to be desired on the basic package due to the extremely low loot squires. Ran 8 mythics got 7 pieces of gear ran normal and heroic raid got 1 so something to think about for everyone who is looking to get loot quickly.

Review.Titre: It was good, but communication isn't great
Review.Contenu: It was good, but not as great as it's been in the past. Communication has really fallen through and I had to keep contacting back to get information. They complete the first part of my single order and then after 4 days of nothing, I had to contact and ask what was up, when I could get in, for them to squeeze the rest of that single order in before reset. Which then the time got changed again before we went, but we got it done.

Review.Titre: Fun and professional, but I have my thoughts
Review.Contenu: This people are amazing and beyond professional. I'm giving 4 stars because in Aberrus the Shadowed Crucible, at least in Normal mode, you won't expect a raid group of 8 groups of people, which makes your loot options extremely lower than expected. Only in the last boss they kindly ask 2 groups to teleport out and make the fight with lesser amount of people. After beating it, those people leave and the remaining groups teleport back inside. So only on that last fight you'll get a decent loot option. They never said that in their website and that's a bit letdown.

Review.Titre: Dawn of the Infinite Mythic Run
Review.Contenu: Dawn of the Infinite Mythic RunThe support team on discord was exceptional. They helped me editing a previous order and changing to the DotI Dungeon Boost without hesitation. 10/10!The boost team was good, though for the first time in a long long time that I’m using this service, they had to postpone more than once my run.I had time scheduling issues due to work and I suggested more than one time slot. In the beginning was supposed to be Friday evening, then Sunday. On Sunday it was moved to Monday, eventually we made it on Tuesday night. I am super comprehensive because they must have a ton of work too boosting all the customers, but all this time and date changing bugged me a little.Still great boost though!

They take a little time to get things together and the communication could be better but they do a FANTASTIC job within the game. Incredibly outstanding team. Third day of crota and they downed him first try!

First time buyer - I'm not a bot.Initial thought I was very very skeptical! As we all should be with so many boosts sites out there. I'm here to say that my wowvendor experience was great and very smooth process. FAST 24/7 customer service. They are very punctual and efficient with their service. I also love how they are very flexible to accommodate me with a last minute change on my schedule. 4/5 stars ez ggz!

Review.Titre: A little Faster Next Time!!! LoL

Review.Titre: I purchased a Heroic Raszageth carry…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a Heroic Raszageth carry for my husband and I on our alts. Overall experience was okay, carriers were no world class raiders by any means but they got it done. Just for anyone looking to purchase this service in the future, this boost took a little over an hour to complete with 6 pulls total.

It may have taken them awhile to complete my order, but when they eventually got to it, they did a great job. I wouldn’t trust anybody else but then to get what I ask then to do done. If you aren’t comfortable sharing your account information, that’s understandable but I’ve done it every time and I’ve gotten my account back every time without any changes or purchases.

I got the Master VoD boost since I was feeling particularly lazy that weekend, but these guys never slack off. They always get your order done even if it takes them down to the last couple of seconds before reset. Wowvendor are the only people that I can trust that my money isn’t going to waste.

Review.Titre: The group was fantastic, ad is not right...
Review.Contenu: The group was fantastic! My only complaint is that the marketing for the run says 50x Aspect's Shadowflame Crest Fragments, which is why I did the run to upgrade gear. Only 40 dropped. That last 10 would have upgraded another piece of gear, so I feel a bit mislead...

Review.Titre: First time caller — would use again in future! :D
Review.Contenu: This was my first time using their services. Based on previous reviewes, they seem like a great service. The team is really helpful (when available). While communication was pretty open whenever I asked for an update, I did a suggestion/thought. More details in updates would be helpful (ex. when you pay for 5-in-1, let the person know which Raid you’re working on). As well as letting them know when services are starting/continuing. Other than those, I was really happy with their service!

Very good and easygoing people. They were willing to work around my work hours and even got some of the challenges done within the raid. The only thing that was somewhat inconvient were the swapping charaters and somewhat long waiting times before actually starting a boss encounter. Overall I am very satisfied and will be sure to put in another order.

Players are obviously elite. Fast delivery. I definitely got what I payed for. I only wish there was a little more communication in chat to briefly explain strategy for those of us who want to participate and learn. However, I have never had a negative experience and will purchase again in the future.

Review.Pseudo: Fellow WoW Lover with not enou

Review.Titre: I did enjoy how fast heroic bosses went…

What I find a pity is that the time is limited to midnight even on weekends. I can understand that during the week, but many would certainly like to use the service longer than midnight. It would also be great if this was communicated in advance. But otherwise very competent people who have high standards themselves. Would like to use the service again.

Shortly after making my purchase I was contacted to set up a line of communication. I was told the raid schedule and to confirm whether the times would work. I accepted the first times I was given, my raid started on time. Of the raids I took part in there were a few wipes but they were able to pull through it all and complete everything I had purchased. All in all it was still pretty quick and I'm very happy with the service, definitely worth the price with the Black Friday discount.

Review.Titre: Completed Successful Run After Initially Cancelled
Review.Contenu: I signed up for a Heroic Jailer run to obtain the AOTC mount before Dragonflight launch. When I hadn't received a party invitation more than 20 minutes after the run was supposed to start, I contacted customer service to ask if there'd been a delay. I was told to run had been canceled and the agent offered to reschedule. I declined and they instead offered either a refund or a credit with with an additional coupon for my troubles. The agent was very kind and understanding. I took the credit and used it towards another run the next evening. I received my party invite on time and the run was successfully completed. There was not any communication or instruction from the group, so it was a bit disorienting, but I was able to tag the boss and get the achievement and mount that I needed. Overall, I'd say the order was filled successfully and I would use this service again in the future.
They finished really fast.  I do wish they would change all the settings (key bindings, etc) when they are finished.  Overall very good service.
